ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Items lost after account cancel?  Multi Users?
ygData.msgSnippet: Whatever you do I seriously wouldn t suggest letting a friend use your account.  While I was on westpac for 9 months I let my friend (who introduced me into
ygData.messageBody:
Whatever you do I seriously wouldn't suggest letting a friend use your
account. While I was on westpac for 9 months I let my friend (who
introduced me into EQ) use my account since I wouldn't be able to play while
I was overseas in the gulf. Well when I came back all my characters were
naked and all they had in their inventorys were trader's sacks. Of course
they were in the bazaar. All my gear on all my characters had been sold in
the bazaar and I had some really expensive stuff like a couple 30k horses.
Of course it was my fault giving him my account to use in the first place.
If you are worried about loosing all your gear then take my advice - never
give your account to your friends.

Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Ceatlitus>
Shadowknight of the 30th Season

-----Original Message-----
From: Techpriest [mailto:techpriest@...]
Sent: Monday, January 26, 2004 8:41 PM
To: EverQuest (E-mail)
Subject: [EverQuest] Items lost after account cancel? Multi Users?


I am back in school and working full time so I don't have time for all my
hobbies. I was thinking of canceling my EQ account for the semester and
picking it back up later. I am only 2 semester from graduation (then I will
have a degree showing I can do what I have been doing for the past 8 years).
How long after you cancel your account will your stuff get erased? I would
hate to start back up later and find all my loot was gone. While paying for
the account would not break me I just hate the feeling that I am wasting
money that could be better spent on my RC racing hobby. Sorry, won't give
up RC for EQ. It gets me out of the house and with real people, and sadly
is the second most physical activity I engage in.

I did have another idea. Let a friend use the account and just tell him to
stay off Tunare where my guys are. While not any cheaper it would help me
with the "waste" aspect. What happens if he is in the game and I try and
log in for a quick game? Will it give me an error, kick him out, suspend
the account, alert the Sony SWAT team?

Thanks! Thanks for help with this in advance and for all the help I have
gotten previously.
